Name: Caribbean Breeze
Ingredients: 37.5 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Garnish with pineapple wedge on rim.
Review: A long cocktail with generous tangy fruit.
Nutrition: One serving of Caribbean Breeze contains 196 calories
